name: DONTidle
description:
DONTidle is a game where you level up by doing your regular computer work.

If you idle for too long, an enemy will attack!

By typing and moving your mouse in any application (Word, Visual Studio, etc.) you will attack the enemy instead, and level up.

This is currently a development release -- progress may be lost due to bugs or when installing new versions. Please report any bugs in the comments below!
